roleset.name: acting like a douche bag (jerk)

example.name: the arg
example.text: Hahaha . I know he 's one of your best friends . And no we re not . Tall skinny guy . Blonde hair . Actor . He was douchey the one night I met him . He 's alright .
example.arg: the one night I met him

roleset.note: DOUCHEY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from douchey.01-j)
